item.description:
Its been a while.....Let's Get Together with Food and Drink, and some wonderful people in our group.  I will have vegetarian pizza, and for our group it would be great to have a good variety of both Kosher and Non-Kosher items.  Please bring what you would like to drink with enough to share. There is an event charge of $2.00 per person.

Over the last few months we have had some new people join our group, and this will also be a wonderful opportunity to meet and make some new friends and greet some old friends as well.  

When you sign up please let us know what you will be bringing.  Lets light a fire under this event and make it a great start to the New Year.

Any questions call Stuart at 860-985-5198.
item.how_to_find_us: Notice will be sent before the event to those attending
item.name: Our First Meetup of the Year
